title: RLM context self-read verification
overview:
Need to confirm whether the RLM architecture is capable of reading its own context data.

**Success criteria:**
- RLM successfully reads CONTEXT_DATA
- RLM outputs 'I SEE YOU' message upon reading context data
problem_statement: Need to confirm whether the RLM architecture is capable of reading its own context data.
success_criteria: RLM outputs 'I SEE YOU' message upon reading context data
